## Author copies

- Check [self-archiving policies](https://openpolicyfinder.jisc.ac.uk/){target=_blank}

- [AIS policy on retaining copyright for conference publications](https://cdn.ymaws.com/aisnet.org/resource/resmgr/Docs/Policy_on_Conference_and_Jou.pdf){target=_blank}
- [HICSS: creative commons license](https://hicss.hawaii.edu/resources/proceedings/){target=_blank}
- [Wiley](https://authorservices.wiley.com/author-resources/Journal-Authors/licensing/self-archiving.html){target=_blank}
- [Elsevier](https://www.elsevier.com/about/policies-and-standards/sharing){target=_blank}
- [SAGE](https://www.sagepub.com/journals/permissions/sages-author-archiving-and-re-use-guidelines){target=_blank}
- [Self-archiving advice](https://www.publisso.de/en/advice/publishing-advice-faqs/electronic-self-archiving){target=_blank}
